extendedInfo.description: Instant access to the information you want! Imagine driving past a house for sale and wanting to get more information right away. Size, price, bedrooms, etc. Now you can with our UPC scanning app! Our app has the ability to scan UPC QR codes and instantly have information about the property on your iPhone. You are driving down the road and see a real estate sign, the sign in front has a phone number but itâs not business hoursâ¦Even during business hours, getting an agent on the phone is not so easy. As usual, there are no fliers in the box . If there are fliers they may be out of date without a new price or some new information. Those fliers are expensive too and often just wind up in the trash - no wonder they are never there. Paper fliers are not very "green" either. Now imagine walking up to that same house and scanning the UPC Code on the For-Sale sign with your iPhone, all the information that you need shows up; size, price, number of bedrooms, baths, pictures as well. The scanned UPC can be updated by the agent, with updates that are immediate, so the most current information is available, not printed on an old flier. UPC - Instant access to the information you want!

reviews.title: False Advertising
reviews.comment: Advertised as an UPC code scanner, actually a QRCode scanner. One is bars, the other is blocks, huge difference.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Does what it claims to do.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fantastic app! Works great and dev listens . Many thanks.

reviews.comment: Wow, this works great, realtors should have these on every sign

reviews.comment: I got an email from this company and decided to try it out. Scanner worked awesome. App looked great. Great job guys.
